tasks.instruction: The App Viewer is showing completely blank/empty. Investigate and fix the application startup issues. Check the main application files, ensure proper imports and exports, verify the React component structure, and make sure the development server can start properly. Fix any compilation errors, missing dependencies, or configuration issues that prevent the app from displaying in the App Viewer.

Enhance the image text overlay tool with the following features:
1. Export selection with two options: 21x30cm at 180 DPI and 21x30cm at 300 DPI
2. Make the text box in real-time preview a floating, movable, and freehand resizable box with drag handles
3. Add stroke styling options to text (color, width)
4. Add more Hebrew fonts to the selection (Gisha, Frank Ruehl CLM, Alef, Rubik Hebrew, Assistant Hebrew)
5. Allow manual font upload functionality (.ttf, .otf files) and use uploaded fonts
6. Restore bulk text processing: upload text file with variable text lines applied to designs in order (line 1 to photo 01, line 2 to photo 02, etc.)
7. Implement zip export functionality for batch processed images
8. Maintain all existing real-time preview and Hebrew language support features
